chapters.title: Chapter 20: Visitations
chapters.info: Selene, p. 224 (177)—Woman who dresses in all white and silver. She visits Mat in the White Tower. She claims that she was in the Tower for some other purpose and just dropped by to see him. She is the most beautiful woman Mat has ever seen. What Mat does not know is that Selene is actually Lanfear. Her true identity is only known by Min. See also Lanfear.
